name: orental green
summary:
Published by	Piyopiyo Records (distributed by BounDEE)
Composed by	Eri Kawai, Michiaki Kato, Kosaku Yamada, Erik Satie, Takeshi Inoue, Franz Gruber, Michiru Oshima, Shin Kusakawa, 小河星志, 現村達也, Hitoshi Kusunoki, Consuelo Velaquez, Rentarou Taki, Teiichi Okano
Arranged by	Michiaki Kato, Eri Kawai, Yasunori Mitsuda, Yoshiki Aoi, Kei Haneoka, 小河星志, Kyoko Toshimori, 現村達也, Haruhiko Saga, Toru Ogiyanagi
Performed by	Eri Kawai
Lyrics by	藤沢晶子, Yuriko Mori, Hakushu Kitahara, Ryuuha Hayashi, Joseph Mohr, John Newton, Takako Tanaka, Hitoshi Kusunoki, Junko Kudo, Consuelo Velaquez, Bansui Doi, Tatsuyuki Takano
info:
• 艺术家: 河井英里
  • 版本特性: Commercial
  • 发售日期: Aug 26, 2009
  • 价格: 3990 JPY
  • 播放时长: 123：30
  • 碟片数量: 2 CD + DVD
